info.name: Files Fuse Mount
info.summary: Mount your local files - managed and processed by Nextcloud
info.description: Sharing your physical data with other apps or networks is often not ideal because Nextcloud cannot "see" any changes made to it. Webdav/dav2fs can solve this, but come with massive overhead and poor performance. This app enables you to expose data as a filesystem that is entirely controlled by Nextcloud
info.author: Moritz Mei√üelbach
